error: Function json_encode() has thrown an error
solution: It is probably not a user but a server error. Possible solution is to edit PHP code manually and contact developer.

error: File/directory expected but got something else
solution: Some application (or you) sent wrong data to the server, that is why it refused to do any harmless operations. Check your application for correctness.

error: We were unable to read/write contents of file/directory
solution: Check file/directory permissions, which you want to work with.

error: Function parse_ini_file() has thrown an error
solution: It is probably not a user but a server error. Possible solution is to edit PHP code manually and contact developer.

error: We don't know what kind of error occured
solution: Err, to tell you the truth, we do not know what kind of error we have encountered. Check PHP file for correctness.
